alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Oneida; Portage; Vilas; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 24 at 9:22PM CST until January 25 at 12:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...COLD TEMPERATURES AND WIND WILL RESULT IN HAZARDOUS CONDITIONS TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... .A fresh surge of cold air flowing into the area on northwest winds will result in hazardous conditions for anyone outdoors without appropriate winter clothing tonight through Tuesday morning. ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold conditions expected, with wind chills around 30 below zero at times. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, and northeast Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until Noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The combination of wind and cold will result in hazardous conditions for anyone outdoors without appropriate winter clothing. Exposed skin can suffer frostbite in as little as 20 minutes in these conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The lowest wind chills will occur between 500 am and 900 am Tuesday.
info.instruction: Dress appropriately if you are going to be outdoors, including a hat, and gloves or mittens.

area.areaDesc: Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Oneida; Portage; Vilas; Wood
